channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What Pete Buttigieg Learned Playing JD Vance
item.description: The politician discusses how Democrats can rebuild trust.

item.title: Live Updates: Thousands Flee Southern Lebanon as Israel Launches More Strikes on Hezbollah
item.description: Israeli attacks since Monday have killed hundreds, according to Lebanon’s health ministry. They have also prompted fears of an all-out war on another ...

item.title: Jamie Dimon thinks India will be the new China as U.S. aims to diversify away from possible future adversary
item.description: "People call it the China+1 strategy. Companies that solely relied on China are looking at India, Vietnam, Malaysia, Indonesia etc."

item.title: Israel’s Strikes on Lebanon
item.description: We explore what led to the strikes, what’s happening now and what might come next.

item.title: In Rare Graft Case in Singapore, Former Minister Pleads Guilty
item.description: S. Iswaran, the former transport minister, had maintained his innocence on the corruption charge for months but on Tuesday pleaded guilty to five less...

item.description: The spending will mainly come from the Department of Defense, which provides medical care to more than 230,000 active duty military women and nearly 2...

item.title: Israeli Strikes Kill Hundreds in Lebanon, and Biden to Address U.N.
item.description: Plus, the U.S. News college rankings are out.

item.title: California Gov. Newsom signs law requiring schools districts to limit or ban students from using smartphones on campus
item.description: The move comes after Newsom signed a law in 2019 authorizing school districts to restrict student phone access.

item.title: Ukrainian Poet and Rock Star Fights Near Front and Performs Behind It
item.description: Serhiy Zhadan, 50, is a beloved Ukrainian poet as well as a novelist, lyricist and rock star. Furious over the invasion, he enlisted to fight even as ...

item.title: Boeing union says planemaker’s ‘final offer’ of a 30% raise for striking workers is not good enough
item.description: The union complained that Boeing publicized its latest offer to 33,000 striking workers without first bargaining with union negotiators.

item.title: An East Coast Port Strike Could Shake the Economy
item.description: Businesses are preparing for a strike by dockworkers on the East and Gulf Coasts, which could begin Oct. 1 if negotiations don’t yield a new contract.
